x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Impact: To give communities a clear picture of accessibility problems so that local councils, institutions, and volunteers can take action.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: People with disabilities face daily challenges in cities, schools, and online spaces. Many of these issues go unrecorded. This project creates a simple public tracker where anyone can report places or services that need better accessibility — from missing wheelchair ramps and uneven sidewalks to websites without captions or alt text.
